Woo.  I am actually going to work on creating a series of episodes
and 
 let my extreme level be the last one.  I am going to redo the
extreme 
 level with a larger map area and a slightly different scenary 
arrangement.

I am glad to know it is possible to beat my extreme level with a 
legitimate team.  Like I said before, I will be working on creating 
scenarios to boost a team up to the point where a legitimate team 
composed of at least 2 members can beat it.  Right now, I am sending 
my slightly legitimate team through the tevfifty and see if they end 
up 
strong enough to beat my extreme level.

I am saving a team [composed of one elf, 2 mages, and 2 clerics] (not 
sending through any scenarios) for when I complete all the scenarios
I 
plan on creating.
